scenario_text.value: Takuma!
Agumon, are you okay?!
I’m fine! So’s everyone else, too. Look!

Man, what a weird feeling. It’s like I can’t
tell if I’m sitting down or standing up.

Stay on your guard, Minoru. In a place like
this, the enemy could be anywhere.

That’s right. Be careful, Saki. The enemy
might suddenly attack from somewhere.

Hey, don’t scare me like that! Where are we,
anyway? Is the Master here? Voltobautamon?!

Oh, look over there! There’s a fight going
on!
It’s Voltobautamon and...is that the Master?!

Traitorous fool! Did you really think you
could defeat me?!
Grrraaaaaawwwrrr!
Urgh?!

You are a threat... Urgh... Yet you too are
to become my prey!

Rrgh... You’re pretty strong... Heheheh. As
befits...the Master of this world...

Now I will grant you eternal rest. Come, you
shall be one with me!

Heheheh... Fine then! Go on and take me in,
if you think you can!
Wha-?! He’s...he’s...
He’s letting himself be eaten?!

*pant*... *pant*... *pant*! Now you are mine
once more!

The power of the maiden, an abundance of
knowledge... Yes, yes! It floods through me!
The Master seems somehow...revitalized?!

He may have regained Miyuki’s power by
consuming Voltobautamon whole.

Wait, does that mean he has the power to open
the door between worlds?!
This is bad! We need to defeat him, now!

Right! He’s still worn out from fighting
Voltobautamon!

This is our chance to stop him, and save both
worlds!
